unnormalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink and You'll Miss Out (Like Pani Puri on a Sunday!)
normalised: Flash Sales: Blink and You will Miss Out Like Pani Puri on a Sunday!

unnormalised: Okay, let's talk flash sales. These things are faster than a Delhi Auto-rickshaw weaving through traffic. You blink, and poof! Gone! Like your chances of getting a decent seat on the Mumbai local during rush hour.
normalised: Okay, let's talk flash sales. These things are faster than a Delhi Auto-rickshaw weaving through traffic. You blink, and poof! Gone! Like your chances of getting a decent seat on the Mumbai local during rush hour.

unnormalised: We've all been there, right? Browsing some website, maybe looking for a new saree for Diwali from, say, a small business in Jaipur trying to make it big. Then BAM! A pop-up screams: "Flash Sale! 70% Off! Ends in 5 minutes!"

unnormalised: Suddenly, you're possessed. Logic flies out the window faster than a kite during Makar Sankranti. Do you *really* need that third pressure cooker? Probably not. But it's only Rs. 299! And it's non-stick! Think of the delicious khichdi you could make!

unnormalised: The pressure is immense. It's like trying to get a reservation at Karim's during Eid. Everyone's fighting for the same prize. Your internet starts lagging, you accidentally add 10 of the same item to your cart, and by the time you actually get to the checkout... Sold out! Dhoka!

unnormalised: But hey, we keep going back for more, don't we? Maybe this time, we'll be the lucky one to snag that handloom rug for our 500 sq ft Mumbai apartment at a steal! Your cupboard (and your doctor) will thank you. Happy shopping, my friends! May your internet be fast and your credit card limit high!
